name: Meatloaf Patty Melt
ingredients: 2 ounces onion, sliced or coarsely chopped, about 1 small
1/2 ounce cheddar cheese, shredded or sliced

instructions.en: Sauté onion in butter until tender and browned. Season with salt to taste.
instructions.sk: Opečte cibuľu na masle do mäkka a zhnednutia. Ochuťte soľou podľa chuti.
instructions.ja: バターで玉ねぎを柔らかく色づくまで炒めます。塩で味を調えます。

instructions.en: Add meatloaf to pan and fry until heated through and browned on both sides.
instructions.sk: Pridajte sekanú do panvice a opečte z oboch strán, kým nie je preohriata a zhnednutá.
instructions.ja: ミートローフをパンに入れ、両面が温まり色づくまで焼きます。

instructions.en: Cover meatloaf with onions; top with cheese. Cover pan to melt cheese.
instructions.sk: Prekryte sekanú cibuľou; navrch položte syr. Prikryte panvicu, aby sa syr roztopil.
instructions.ja: ミートローフに玉ねぎをのせ、その上にチーズをのせます。蓋をしてチーズを溶かします。
